H0.text: In the Hans Christian Andersen tale, what item could a princess feel through 20 mattreses . Needle

H1.text: In the Hans Christian Andersen tale, what item could a princess feel through 20 mattreses . Coin

H2.text: In the Hans Christian Andersen tale, what item could a princess feel through 20 mattreses . Ring

H3.text: In the Hans Christian Andersen tale, what item could a princess feel through 20 mattreses . Pe'a

A4.text: She decides to test their unexpected guest by placing a hard uncooked pea in the bed she is offered for the night, covered by twenty mattresses and twenty featherbeds.
